name: Deadly Cards
description:
Pick the set of cards you want to use, Choose the difficulty and Try to kill as many enemies as you can! 

Click on the cardsto flip them over, and try to find matching cards.  Every match deals damage to enemies, every mismatch deals damage to you.  The more matches you make in a row, the more damage you deal! Clearing all the board will also increase your damage and heal yourself a bit.
